text: I have a 20 lpa fixed offer from Teksystems for their client Schindler Electric. But my current organisation is planning to retain me with 25 ctc. Schindler electric is more interested in hiring me as permanent employee with at least 20 lpa. Any help on how much shall i ask Schindler Electric when the HR calls for final discussion. They do provide stocks. Please help me on this with your valuable thoughts
